articles.title: März 2020 : Wie alles begann

articles.title: Banken : EZB genehmigt anteilige Übernahme der Commerzbank durch UniCredit
articles.teaser: Die Europäische Zentralbank hat der Großbank UniCredit erlaubt, 29,9 Prozent der Commerzbank zu übernehmen. Das öffnet Wege zu einer vollständigen Übernahme.
articles.image_title: Banken: The headquarters of German bank Commerzbank is pictured in Frankfurt am Main, western Germany, on September 24, 2024. German Chancellor Olaf Scholz on September 23, 2024 issued a sharp warning to UniCredit to refrain from "unfriendly" acts after the Italian bank revealed it had significantly increased its stake in Germany's Commerzbank. UniCredit said it now held a stake of around 21 percent in Germany's second-largest lender, making it the largest shareholder ahead of the German state. The move has fuelled speculation of a potential takeover, setting the stage for a clash with Berlin, which still owns 12 percent of Commerzbank.

The factory, which produces the gasoline-powered and hybrid Golf, Tiguan, Touran and Tayron models, churns out over half a million cars a year. Volkswagen faced a sharp decline in global sales last year. The company is seeking to reduce its work force and possibly close some of its German factories. articles.title: Kinderbetreuung : Weiter Personalmangel in der Kinderbetreuung
articles.teaser: In der Kinderbetreuung und -erziehung arbeiten deutlich mehr Menschen als noch vor ein paar Jahren. Dennoch ist die Personalsituation weiter angespannt.
articles.image_title: Kinderbetreuung: BERLIN, GERMANY - SEPTEMBER 14: Children play outside in the playground at the Kleiner Fratz child daycare center in Neukoelln on September 14, 2022 in Berlin, Germany. Child daycare centers across Germany are facing compounding problems, including rising costs for energy and food as well as a shortage of staff. At the Kleiner Fratz Neukoelln center instalment payments for energy have gone up 50% and food prices 9%, yet the amount of money the center receives from the city per child has gone unchanged. The center has the capacity to take on another 30 children but cannot do so because it lacks the required extra four teachers. Germany is facing a possible energy crisis as well as economic recession to consequences stemming from Russia's ongoing war in Ukraine.

articles.image_title:
Fusionskraftwerke: BU Vorschlag: Ein Blick auf den Reaktorbereich von ITER (Internationaler Thermonuklearer Versuchsreaktor) in Frankreich. ++++++++++
FRANCE - NOVEMBER 15, 2024: A view shows the reactor zone of ITER (International Thermonuclear Experimental Reactor). Nizhny Novgorod's Gykom engineers set about installing gyrotron units developed by the Institute of Applied Physics with the Russian Academy of Sciences for ITER, an international nuclear fusion research project based in France. Its goal consists in exploring and proving the scientific and technological feasibility of fusion as a source of energy on an industrial scale. A gyrotron is a state-of-the-art plasma-heating device that generates enough power to maintain such operation. Dmitry Orlov/TASS/ddp/Sipa USA

articles.title: Klimawandel : Deutschland hat 2024 sein Klimaziel erreicht
articles.teaser: Laut Umweltbundesamt hat Deutschland 2024 weniger Treibhausgase ausgestoßen, als es die Klimaziele erlaubt hätten. Verbesserungsbedarf gibt es im Bau- und Verkehrssektor.
articles.image_title: Klimawandel: GRIESSEN, GERMANY - OCTOBER 11: A couple watch bucket excavators and other heavy mining machinery work to extract lignite coal from the pit of the Jaenschwalde open-pit coal mine on October 11, 2018 near Griessen, Germany. The Jaenschwalde mine feeds coal to the nearby Jaenschwalde power plant, which is the fourth highest prducer of CO2 emissions of any power plant in Europe with approximately 25 millions tons annually. Germany has invested heavily into renewable energy sources such as wind and solar, though critics charge the government is not doing enough to phase out the country's continued reliance on coal. Of the 20 biggest CO2 emiting coal-fired power plants in Europe, eight are in Germany.

articles.image_title: Infektionsgeschehen: MODEL RELEASED. Measles rash on a 19 year old woman's face. Measles,also known as morbilli or rubeola,is a highly infectious airborne viral disease. It mainly affects children,but can occur at any age and the adult form is more severe. An attack usually gives lifelong immunity. After an incubation period (8- 15 days),flu-like symptoms develop,accompanied by fever. Four days later,a red rash appear
